title: I just finished my sem-2 have questions about future sems
content: I finished my first year in PES and didn't go that well expecting a cgpa of 7. What is the syllabus of CSE with AI-ML so that I can study in vacation and get an idea because I'm aiming for 9+ sgpa in both sems.

comments.body:
Ig no one knows the syllabus cuz it’s a new specialisation which started this year. Coming to improving CGPA u only got 4 more SEMs to improve cuz after 6th sem placement season begins. If u are aiming to to get 9+ sgpa there’s no need to start early just focus on classes, clear the concepts in the class itself. Make ur own notes. Ik this is hard but trust me once u get used to it u will enjoy. 

All the best !!
